about_the_game:
MOONSHIRE is an action-adventure game set in a non-linear world full of many challenges, and many rewards! Forced to escape your homeland due to an ominous threat, you assume the role of the Sage's Apprentice, whose goal is to find a way to save MOONSHIRE.

COMBAT

Learn the art of combat as taught by the Sage. Explore a range of weapons, from conventional spears and longswords to versatile options like boomerangs and the magical Lightning Rod. Each weapon enhances your defense when equipped, and can also be strategically employed - sacrifice it to restore health, or throw it as a projectile for long-range damage.

EXPLORATION

By exploring your surroundings and overcoming the dungeons, bosses, and battles along the way, you'll uncover exciting new items and abilities that improve your options in combat, while also opening up new areas to explore.

SAVE MOONSHIRE!

Uncover the mysteries surrounding the unknown threat, and make your way back home to MOONSHIRE! Your path is filled with challenges and opportunities, so arm yourself with unique abilities and an arsenal of weapons. The fate of MOONSHIRE rests in your hands...
